data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What is something that can easily distract you when you are trying to work on something? Explain the reasons why it distracts you.
data.answer: When it comes to something that can easily distract me when I am trying to work on something, I suppose it would be my phone. No surprise here. It's easy to understand why – the smartphones people using nowadays are remarkable device. They allow people to do a great number of things. For instance, I am bombarded throughout the day with emails, texts, social media notifications, and phone calls. Additionally, I use my phone to jot down reminders, view our calendars, listen to a podcast, or go shopping. There is no wonder that I am addicted to my phone. It has, without a doubt, become an indispensable part of me. I cannot imagine a life without a phone. Nonetheless, I need to work out some ways to overcome my reliance on my phone so that I can be more focused on what I really need to attend to. (148字)
